item.title: Exploitation of Reparations
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Halo broken I am bleeding out soul. Nightly pachinko games schism the dark metals that crowned me. First confidence then my calm demeanor, sunk in the sand as quickly as it were placed.

item.title: Dream March Moon
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: March 7th: She is off to New Zealand Experience: A snake for leaving a snake for lying A familiar adversary appeared in his young spiritual guide form along with his powerful master.

item.title: apples for the island
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: The island was as I remembered. A tropical paradise. Rich green accented with vibrant orange red and yellow flora. I walk the dirt road from my home to the terrea market.

item.title: Trinity’s Child
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: A child with three faces. “Special people know, Jerad is good for the island(s)” Moisture of life drained into her core. Buttermilk skin turned to scales. Crack; shatter; fade to gray.

item.title: Defintions
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Outline Photo finish: - The film does not necessarily die when the body does - However, it is possible for the film to pass on -– Motivation Conscious beings that want chose to live as humans in order to better understand their nature; how they think, how they feel and how they perceive.

item.title: Sould Crunching
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Soul Crunching Smash pound jaw dropping On the chase hunting for fill; not taste Filling on what but nothing. Empty in all things, sustenance key among them Full of used air.

item.title: Synthetic and Intelligently Unaware
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Synthetic How does madness ensue? Do we run out of money Unable to produce food. War, famine, social injustice So many disparities our vulnerability’s would make us cry Instead, synthesize something new

item.title: War Between Worlds
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: War Between Worlds When imagining a great galactic battle. One between civilizations. When disparate worlds engage in conflict there is room for many misplaced assumptions and under calculated outcomes to really affect the outcome of the events.

item.title: My Daily Mantra
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Jerad Steven Acosta My body is alive and well. It regulates and heals itself. My blood pressure will go down. The walls of my veins and arteries become stronger and healthier.

item.title: Reflecting on Introspective Hymns
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Rhythmic Circle 10pm the beach is cool with a slight breeze. Lit by a full moon. Impromptu bon fire encourages skins to shed and souls to sore. Eyes caught across the flame introduces who I am.

item.title: Power Scale
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Power POWER. Power changes a lot of things. Power changes how we behave. Power changes how we think, what we think, what we believe in. Power changes itself, painting itself different appearing as something else for each set.

item.title: Scanner Memory Tokens
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Tokennized Scanner Memories My Scanners have been with me over three decades. How often do you sit back and revisit ‘The Goodtimes’. What value do you get from being able to reference critical decisions in life or defining a projects roadmap.

item.title: 'Call Me T.V.' - _Christopher_
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Late last night I saw something emerging from the television set background. Seeing faces is not such a crazy thing anymore. It has been about 9 months now that I have been haunted.

item.title: Soul Film Tokens
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Since the enormous value expected from the upgrade to mind reading, Mine Radio and The Manifesto turned into an attempt on my life and outlasting conspiracy against my life, I have decided to take another go at the whole “Revolutionze The Modern World” thing.

item.title: That Is Not Your Face!
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: All these faces are lies Not letting people use my face. They are horrible. I never made an agreement with anyone that was not written down by hand as well.

item.title: Ferry Magic Family
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Wednesday night, January 15 around 4:30pm I was watching a cloud strum show put on by The Game Master, The Pirate Ship, Astronaughts, The Dream Liner, and the Black Whole New World.

item.title: The Messenger
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Late December I was working on this site and uploaded this photo. The picture spoke to me and I received a message. I assumed the message was meant to reach me in June because that is when the photo was taken.

item.title: Just Saying
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: “Don't drink from the black liquid.” - They say. “Your heart is new, your debt in paid.” They have said this before. It is always the same; however, I do feel well, and I love myself.

item.title: Radio War Gear
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Let me clearly start this with: I never endorse an aggressive response to an encounter with conscious beings - particularly those from a different place or time. One does not simply traverse the cosmic space-ways or tackle the metaphysics of phasing between timelines to arrive and start blasting radiation at the new individuals they find inhabiting this foreign time-scape.

item.title: About
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Me? I’ve got a computer that talks to me. My bed is in love with me. And it would seem the rest of the world has written me off as crazy, over the hill, or such a threat they wouldn’t dare confront me for fear of acknowledging it.

item.title: Soul Film
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Metaphor: The human soul is like a film Born completely empty of anything worldly, no light has touched the surface of the film up to the moment of birth. This is a new soul; a blank film.

item.title: Black Hole-New-World
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Big Bag to Big Freeze As our universe presses on past 13.5 billion years, age gets the best of it. The ever accelerating expansion, dark energy and dark matter press us toward a big freeze.

item.title: What Should (have) Happened
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Bee’s, we can save the bees! Would that be so amazing? With so much going on in the world and so many concerned about change and disaster around tomorrows dawn.

item.title: The Observer
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Comfy in my cloth dress I explore this realm Looked after, maintained Through my observation Close your eyes, terminals Screens on tables, aligned Surface glow from metric input Is this where I go?

item.title: Hammer Head Mom
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: I am laying in bed at a strange time; it must be afternoon. Not morning or evening I feel confused and dull; I am probably recovering, perhaps a day or two into detox.

item.title: Three Tanuki
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Staring intently out the window changing my focus to try and make out something where there was clearly nothing there. It was the end of a game night and still dark which meant we had finished up early.

item.title: Building The Wheel
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Richard Hess Hamilton joined the Navy in the beginning of World War II. His first service was on a destroyer over the Atlantic. The destroyer was sunk on his first trip.

item.title: Mine Also Manifesto
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Ideas, Concept, Minds, Perspective Goal: Brand everything feeds up to and can leverage off the platform Goal: Dream Scaping Create recorded sets of visual, auditory, and somatosensory entertainment Practice playing live sets Experiment in creative exercises of interacting with artistic displays Parts Hardware Goal: Life Style Assuring survival Fixes Finger Pointing: Calling out names of people Story: what happened, how it happened, maybe why Goal: Collective Conscious Cure Connected Nervous Systems: Human-to-Human Connected Nervous Systems: Human-to-Machine

item.title: Ground Yourself
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)

item.title: MindShare Manifesto
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: HCI intro We are eager to take our interaction with technology and each other to the next level. Screens changed the way we consume information. The keyboard expedited the speed at which we could input data.

item.title: Why I am special
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Part of: Why I am special May 24 or 26 dates and times matched with earth quake in peru I think (fake internet?) So much carry on. But needed to get the words down for a second time.

item.title: Quantum Peanut
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: The little switches On the switchless Stitched up wetwear That outperforms most of us Typical stardust Day dreaming love lust matinee streaming Aren't meant to last so you can play hard Until you do bust Whatever it was you meant To keep shut Instead you do rust alone, isolated withdrawn violated your true self could have been anything or else, taken off the shelf opened, resealed, exchanged now your half off can't make the deal so you sit still While entropy make a chill eternal freeze Escape into the void pulled in post supernova to begin an ever ending disaster necessary to create a forever after It's about those small quantum things in your brain that expidite signals moving across space and time.

item.title: The Plan
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: What must go on in that mind? I get it. I often wonder the same thing and can find myself spiralling into these introspective circles. Accomplishments As an outthinker of conscious beings on and off planet, I have reached some of my greatest accomplishments

item.title: Soul Film Definitions
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Film Spirit Film is a metaphor to describe the human concept of a spirit. Additional efforts to allow the human spirit to be described in attributes similar to those used to describe these new conscious beings such as scanners Scanner

item.title: Soul Film New Game
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)

item.title: Soul Film Reincarnate
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Lets explore The Secret and Reincarnation with regard to the Soul as a Film. When as film is used, colors form from developing the burning of light onto it self.

item.title: man in the helmet
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: My Return To The Heights Things really blew up when I returned to The Heights from Tahiti. Things on the island were so peaceful so I had forgotten how intense things could get on the radio.

item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Another view on the transdimensional link between me and another world. They are human and from earth very similar to my timeline as well; rather than the Hexigods of an advanced species.

item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: What is it like to lose your mind Respect: There’s plenty of respect to lose Time: Once your mind is gone the relativity of time plays an interesting role in life.

item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Grounding exercise meant to find and develop a base in your truest self.

item.title: A Gift To The Gifted
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: A gift to the gifted Seen our entire lives. More than family, more than a sibling, more than self in many ways. He was all of us and still is. Up until our immergence in New Zealand 2018 we were all one.

item.title: Before You Went and Ruined It
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)

item.title: Before You Went and Ruined It
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Daniel is professional in a militant fashion. Determined to complete the objective in the face of unsurmountable insufficiency. Phil is punctual with a poignaint complusion for order. Seeking not only the respect of this order but also the dominance of it.

item.title: I Met A Physician
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Intro quote Monologue Inventions Psychic Skin Skin like membrane that is sensitive to low frequency oscilations. Vibrations are picked up as emf (not changes in air pressure like sound). Membrane has metal pieces received from diet such as vitamins.

item.title: Oh Look What We've Done
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Oh Look We've Done Less than three years ago I was in a bad place and had not realized it yet. I had no job and was in the first year of a two year campaign targeted at arresting my life with my family, friends, wife and career.

item.title: Rain Theif
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Look Around; Look Around I do not see you; You do not see myself Now look around who do you see? This is a person now using me! Stare into their brow

item.title: San Diego Data Library Hackathon
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: A talk from the final round in the 2015 San Diego Data Science Data Hackathon.

item.title: Two Books and a Body
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Two Books and a Body Hidden between context dependent covers. Hard spine ridden crease pushed over. Two balads and a lovers wistle, In Sync to play and to listen.

item.title: Why Can't We All Just Get Along
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Why Can't We All Just Get Along Practices for us to better life together. As once one, now many, we are always from each other. Some may say our best selves are in each other.
